name: invenadro
description: Invenadro - Sistema de procesamiento de factor de redondeo

scripts.deploy:frontend:dev: cd FrontEnd-lambdas && npm run build && cd ../services/frontend && serverless deploy --stage dev --verbose
scripts.deploy:frontend:qa: cd FrontEnd-lambdas && npm run build && cd ../services/frontend && serverless deploy --stage qa --verbose
scripts.deploy:frontend:prod: cd FrontEnd-lambdas && npm run build && cd ../services/frontend && serverless deploy --stage prod --verbose
scripts.deploy:all:dev: npm run deploy:backend:dev && npm run deploy:frontend:dev
scripts.deploy:all:qa: npm run deploy:backend:qa && npm run deploy:frontend:qa
scripts.deploy:all:prod: npm run deploy:backend:prod && npm run deploy:frontend:prod
scripts.logs:initiator:dev: cd services/backend && serverless logs -f initiator --stage dev --tail
scripts.logs:processor:dev: cd services/backend && serverless logs -f processor --stage dev --tail
scripts.build:frontend: cd FrontEnd-lambdas && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../../FrontEnd-lambdas && npm install

author: Julian Salinas
